arxiv_files.title: Large Language Models for Code Repair
arxiv_files.summary: This paper explores the application of large language models for automated code repair. The authors analyze various prompt engineering strategies and evaluate their performance across multiple benchmarks.

arxiv_files.title: Neural Methods in Software Engineering
arxiv_files.summary: A survey on neural-network-driven approaches in software engineering, covering code generation, bug detection, and program synthesis.

arxiv_files.title: Improving Cybersecurity Training
arxiv_files.summary: This work proposes an improved training system for cybersecurity awareness using interactive simulations and reinforcement learning.
